title: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf | Academy of Achievement

quotes: I was a special assistant to the Minister of Finance in ’69 and then went off to graduate work at the Economics Institute of the University of Colorado at Boulder

organizations.name: World Bank
quotes: It’s a long way from helping an accountant at an auto repair shop to working with the World Bank.
To get to the World Bank, I had already left the shop.

organizations.name: Treasury Department
quotes: I was working in the Treasury Department, what we now call the Ministry of Finance

roles.title: Assistant Minister
quotes: When I went off I had been Assistant Minister, you’re correct.
So once again you had to leave the kids in Liberia when you went off to graduate school?
